@dev admin function to pause/unpause the contract
    @param _pause True to pause the contract & vice-versa

@dev link an Arweave address to the caller's address (msg.sender)
    @param _arweave_address base64url 43 char string

@dev admin function to pause/unpause the contract
    @param _pause True to pause the contract & vice-versa

@dev link an Arweave address to the caller's address (msg.sender)
    @param _arweave_address base64url 43 char string

devdoc.author: charmful0x
devdoc.details: link an EVM address to an Arweave address. The contract is deterministic, but as part of Ark Network, it becomes non-deterministic where the result depends on the other SmartWeave contracts states.

params._network: network's name. This contract is EVMs compatible
params._pausedContract: initial contract's pause state. Assigned to False

linkIdentity(string).details: link an Arweave address to the caller's address (msg.sender)

reversePauseState(bool).details: admin function to pause/unpause the contract

params._pause: True to pause the contract & vice-versa

devdoc.title: Ark Network

userdoc.notice: this contract is only for testing purpose
